top-text: Create workouts your way. Build custom training plans, track progress, and stay in control of every exercise.

Block_1.text: Create workouts that match your training style. Build and organize sessions by muscle groups, training days, or goals with full control over every exercise.

Block_2.text: Monitor your training progress with clear stats and visual insights. Track workouts, time, calories, volume, and muscle group balance all in one place.

Block_3.text: Take control of your interval training. Mix intensity, timing, and recovery to create workouts that fit your goals — not the other way around.

Block_4.text: Set your working weight in seconds with a visual barbell calculator. Add plates, adjust the bar, and get precise totals instantly no mental math, no mistakes.

Block_5.text: Plan your workout your way. Add exercises, manage sets and reps, track weight, and control rest timers in a simple, focused interface.

Block_6.text: Personalize the app with multiple color themes to match your style, environment, and training focus. Train in an interface that feels comfortable and clear every time.

Block_7.text: Add an exercise using any image, then define sets, reps, weight, and rest time in seconds. Simple setup, full control.

Block_8.text: Organize your workout effortlessly. Reorder exercises, edit details, or remove them in seconds with simple gestures.

KEY_FEATURES.title: KEY FEATURES
KEY_FEATURES.1: Flexible workout builder with full control over exercises
KEY_FEATURES.2: Progress tracking for workouts and individual exercises
KEY_FEATURES.3: Interval training with custom time, weight, and rest for each set
KEY_FEATURES.4: Visual barbell weight calculator for fast and accurate setup
KEY_FEATURES.6: Multiple color themes to personalize the app
KEY_FEATURES.7: Fast creation of custom exercises with your own images
KEY_FEATURES.8: Intuitive controls designed for quick and efficient workout planning
